locations.name: Reading Terminal Market
locations.clue: Seek a place where the past meets the present, a lively hub built in the 1893 that was once home to train passengers and now bustles with merchants and hungry visitors

locations.name: LOVE Park
locations.clue: Feel the LOVE in the center of the city.

locations.name: Rocky Statue
locations.clue: Run like a champ where Rocky stands!
